entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening then changing to 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
